title: Dirty Girl - Part Two
description: Angus Boone is the devil. He lured me in, but not with candy or treats. And like the devil, he saw what no one else did. All of my sins...all of the stains on my soul. And then he smiled. I should have run...far far away. Instead I made a deal that changed us both forever.  ***This is part two of a three-part serial***  Head's This is an erotic romance with a heroine who knows her own mind, lots of adult content, graphic sexual situations, and harsh language. Intended for readers 18 + only.
author: Allie Cooke
